price: Дарҳақиқат, Биз дунё осмонини юлдузлар безаги ила безадик.
arabic: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلۡكَوَاكِبِ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā zayyannā al-samāa al-dun'yā bizīnatin al-kawākibi
